title: Goodness, Truth and Beauty | Discussing with Fr. Stephen Freeman
description:
I discuss with Fr. Stephen Freeman about how to live and how beauty is essential to the human experience. Fr. Stephen is an Orthodox priest from Tennessee,  author of "Everywhere Present" and of the blog "Glory to God for All Things."  

You can find Fr. Stephen"s work on his website: 
https://blogs.ancientfaith.com/glory2godforallthings/ 


My links:  
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicWorld/
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan

My website designers,  Anomalist Design: https://www.anomalistdesign.com/

The music at the opening is Russian Eastern Overture, by Rimsky Korsakov.
